original_text: “When you go out to war against your enemies, and see horses and chariots and an army larger than your own, you shall not be afraid of them, for the Lord your God is with you, who brought you up out of the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 네가 나가서 적군과 싸우려 할 때에 말과 병거와 백성이 너보다 많음을 볼지라도 그들을 두려워하지 말라 애굽 땅에서 너를 인도하여 내신 네 하나님 여호와께서 너와 함께 하시느니라

sentences.original_text: When you go out to war against your enemies,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 대적과 싸우러 나갈 때에,

sentences.original_text: and an army larger than your own,
you shall not be afraid of them,
for the Lord your God is with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너의 하나님 여호와께서 너와 함께 계심이라.

sentences.original_text: who brought you up out of the land of Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내신 하나님이시니라.
